name: justETH
desc: Just ETH is an innovative, food rating app with dynamic voting power by redefining restaurant ratings through blockchain and AI.
details:
Key Features:

- Blockchain-based voting system
- AI-powered restaurant recommendations
- Dynamic user reputation system

Technologies Used:

- Ethereum Smart Contracts
- React Native
- TensorFlow for AI integration
